name: The Grand Illusion
description:
Juggling balls are your ammo! You throw them at enemies to deal damage and once you throw one you must walk over and pick it up to throw it again. This forces you  to  sometimes walk near enemies for a second or two before you hit them; kind of like a dance. I was going to make a juggling joke but I couldn't think of anything. 
Feedback is also good.

Oh yeah its buggy so lol    ¯\_( ͠° ͟ʖ ͠° )_/¯
